meta.description: Optimize the number of small and large bottles to maximize the total amount of honey transported.

sets.name: BOTTLE_TYPES
sets.description: Types of bottles available for transporting honey.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each bottle type in units of honey.

params.name: max_bottles
params.description: Maximum number of each bottle type available.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of bottles used for each type.

objective.name: max_total_honey
objective.description: Maximize the total amount of honey transported.

constraints.name: max_small_bottles
constraints.description: Cannot use more than 300 small bottles.

constraints.name: max_large_bottles
constraints.description: Cannot use more than 100 large bottles.

constraints.name: total_bottles_limit
constraints.description: Cannot use more than 200 bottles in total.

constraints.name: min_large_bottles
constraints.description: At least 50 large bottles must be used.

constraints.name: small_bottles_twice_large
constraints.description: At least twice as many small bottles as large bottles must be used.
